name: Its gotten windy up there
description:
It'S Gotten Windy Up There 
is a 2D Platformer with puzzle elements. In the future, humans are forced to live beneath the surface, all they wish for is a better environment. You play as Edda, a scientist who tries to save the world. Gather enough information and travel back in time to prevent the greatest natural catastrophy humankind has ever seen. 

This Game was made during the Brackeys Game Jam 2020.2

I wasn't able to make it playable in the browser, but I hope you will download it and give it a try!

Note:
I'm a Game Artist. Programming is my archenemy, therefore the game may have some bugs. But I hope you can still play it fluidly! (ʘ‿ʘ✿)9
